Headline: Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are experiencing significant delays due to police activity near Harlem/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing significant delays due to police activity near Harlem/Lake. Crews working to restore service.

Bus shuttles are available from Harlem/Lake to Harlem/Laramie.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
